row.process:
:INC JOBI.BBS.JOBPDEFAULTS :PSET &IDT_LC# = CONV_LC("&IDT#") ! ----------------------------------- ! Export- Importverzeichnis zuweisen: ! ----------------------------------- ! Verzeichnisstruktur: ! -------------------- !/mnt/srv/oratrans !|-- dllw1i !| `-- disda !| |-- expdp !| | |-- dmp !| | |-- log !| | `-- scripts !| `-- impdp !| |-- log !| | |-- dllw2e !| | `-- dllw2i !| `-- scripts !|-- dllw1p !| |-- bilanz !| | |-- expdp !| | | |-- dmp !| | | |-- log !| | | `-- scripts !| | `-- impdp !| | |-- log !| | `-- scripts !| |-- disda !| | |-- expdp !| | | |-- dmp !| | | |-- log !| | | `-- scripts !| | `-- impdp !| | |-- log !| | `-- scripts !| `-- wartung !| |-- expdp !| | |-- dmp !| | |-- log !| | `-- scripts !| `-- impdp !| |-- log !| `-- scripts !`-- tempsav ! ----------------------------------------------------------------- :PSET &DIRECTORY# = "DLD_DMP_DISDA_SPIEGEL" :PSET &EXP_PATH# = "/mnt/srv/oratrans/dllw1&IDT_LC#/disda/expdp" :PSET &IMP_PATH# = "/mnt/srv/oratrans/dllw1&IDT_LC#/disda/impdp" ! ---------------------------------- ! Parameter &MANDANT# initialisieren: ! ---------------------------------- ! :PSET &MANDANT# = "ALLE" ! --------------------------------- ! Parameter &COUNT# initialisieren: ! --------------------------------- :PSET &COUNT# = "99" !**********GeneratedText, Do Not Change********** :SET &pttyp# = SYS_ACT_PTTYP() !Eintragen der READ Befehle :BEGINREAD :IF &pttyp# = "D" : PRINT "", "Bei Start via GUI wird die Eingabe der Startzeit unterdrückt" :ELSE : READ &START#,,"START [JJJJ-MM-TT HH:MM:SS]",'',K :ENDIF :READ &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST#,,"UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST [JN]",'N',K :READ &MODUS#,,"MODUS [INITIAL/DELTA]",'INITIAL',K :READ &STARTZEITEN#,,"STARTZEITEN [J/N]",'J',K :READ &VALUTA#,,"VALUTA [JJJJMMTT]",'',K :READ &VALUTA_VON#,,"VALUTA_VON [JJJJMMTT]",'',K :READ &VALUTA_BIS#,,"VALUTA_BIS [JJJJMMTT]",'',K :READ &MANDANTEN#,,"MANDANTEN [01,02,20,21,54]",'01,02,20,21,54',K :READ &AB_VTR_NR#,,"AB_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &BIS_VTR_NR#,,"BIS_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &OHNE_VTR_NR#,,"OHNE_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &ANZAHL#,,"ANZAHL [NNNN]",'',K :READ &PARALLEL#,,"PARALLEL [1..100]",'',K :READ &TRACE#,,"TRACE [J/N]",'N',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &RUN_DBEXPORT#,,"RUN_DBEXPORT [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_DBIMPORT#,,"RUN_DBIMPORT [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_DATALAKE_BBS#,,"RUN_DATALAKE_BBS [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_DDSTATISTIK#,,"RUN_DDSTATISTIK [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_DDCOGNOS#,,"RUN_DDCOGNOS [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_DDBATCH#,,"RUN_DDBATCH [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_AUSLOESER#,,"RUN_AUSLOESER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_GENERATOR#,,"RUN_GENERATOR [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_SELEKTIERER#,,"RUN_SELEKTIERER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_BEARBEITER#,,"RUN_BEARBEITER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_DDGATHER#,,"RUN_DDGATHER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_DDBD#,,"RUN_DDBD [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_DATALAKE_DISDA#,,"RUN_DATALAKE_DISDA [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_DATALAKE_COGNOS#,,"RUN_DATALAKE_COGNOS [J/N]",'J',K :ENDREAD
!Eintragen der PSET Befehle :PSET &START# = &START# :PSET &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# :PSET &MODUS# = &MODUS# :PSET &STARTZEITEN# = &STARTZEITEN# :PSET &VALUTA# = &VALUTA# :PSET &VALUTA_VON# = &VALUTA_VON# :PSET &VALUTA_BIS# = &VALUTA_BIS# :PSET &MANDANTEN# = &MANDANTEN# :PSET &AB_VTR_NR# = &AB_VTR_NR# :PSET &BIS_VTR_NR# = &BIS_VTR_NR# :PSET &OHNE_VTR_NR# = &OHNE_VTR_NR# :PSET &ANZAHL# = &ANZAHL# :PSET &PARALLEL# = &PARALLEL# :PSET &TRACE# = &TRACE# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# :PSET &RUN_DBEXPORT# = &RUN_DBEXPORT# :PSET &RUN_DBIMPORT# = &RUN_DBIMPORT# :PSET &RUN_DATALAKE_BBS# = &RUN_DATALAKE_BBS# :PSET &RUN_DDSTATISTIK# = &RUN_DDSTATISTIK# :PSET &RUN_DDCOGNOS# = &RUN_DDCOGNOS# :PSET &RUN_DDBATCH# = &RUN_DDBATCH# :PSET &RUN_AUSLOESER# = &RUN_AUSLOESER# :PSET &RUN_GENERATOR# = &RUN_GENERATOR# :PSET &RUN_SELEKTIERER# = &RUN_SELEKTIERER# :PSET &RUN_BEARBEITER# = &RUN_BEARBEITER# :PSET &RUN_DDGATHER# = &RUN_DDGATHER# :PSET &RUN_DDBD# = &RUN_DDBD# :PSET &RUN_DATALAKE_DISDA# = &RUN_DATALAKE_DISDA# :PSET &RUN_DATALAKE_COGNOS# = &RUN_DATALAKE_COGNOS# !**************End of GeneratedText************** ! -------------------------------------------- ! Feststellen, welcher &MODUS# es werden soll: ! -------------------------------------------- :SET &PARENT_TYPE_ACT# = GET_PARENT_TYPE(&ME_RUNNR#, ACT) :PRINT " >>> PARENT_TYPE_ACT : &PARENT_TYPE_ACT#" :IF &PARENT_TYPE_ACT# = "SCRI" : PSET &MODUS# = GET_VAR("VARA.BATCH.DISDA_BATCH", "MODUS") :ENDIF :PRINT " -> MODUS: &MODUS#"
:PSET &PARALLEL_DEFAULT# = GET_VAR("VARA.CONFIG_EBENE", "PARALLEL_DEFAULT") :IF &PARALLEL# = "" : PSET &PARALLEL# = "&PARALLEL_DEFAULT#" :ENDIF
